title: Spaghetti Carbonara
description: A classic Italian pasta dish made with eggs, cheese, pancetta, and pepper.
steps: Boil spaghetti in salted water until al dente.
In a bowl, beat eggs and mix with grated Pecorino cheese.
Fry pancetta in a pan until crisp.
Mix spaghetti with pancetta and remove from heat.
Quickly mix in the egg and cheese mixture, and season with black pepper.
